query: mutation(  $device_uuid: String!, $timezone: String!,  $device_token: String!,  $buffer_mins:Int!, $morningLabel: String!,$morningDow: Dows!,$morningHr: Hours !, $morningMin: Mins!) {upsert_schedule(timezone: $timezone,device_token: $device_token, device_uuid: $device_uuid, buffer_mins:$buffer_mins, entries: [{label: $morningLabel,dow: $morningDow, hr: $morningHr, min: $morningMin},] ){ id } }
